label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_019
content:
## 2024-07-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 109
- Active: 99
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 52
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 10

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 37

### Efficacy By Arm
#### Multimodal
- VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.2
- VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 27.8
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.5
- Six MWT (meters) Mean: 346.0
- Six MWT (meters) SD: 55.0
- Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.9
- Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.6
- Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.7
- Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.0
- Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.2

#### Standard
- VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.5
- VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.4
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.0
- Six MWT (meters) Mean: 303.0
- Six MWT (meters) SD: 57.0
- Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.1
- Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.4
- Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.5
- Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.9
- Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.4

#### Placebo
- VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.3
- VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 46.1
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.4
- Six MWT (meters) Mean: 267.0
- Six MWT (meters) SD: 35.0
- Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.1
- Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.4
- Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.8
- Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.8
- Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.1

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 220
- Sessions Attended: 201
- Attendance Rate (%): 87.5

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.4
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0
- WBC (k) Mean: 5.9
- WBC (k) SD: 1.6
- Platelets (k) Mean: 245
- Platelets (k) SD: 43
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.05
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.18
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 100.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 14.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 10.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1997, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1940, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1940, Description: constipation, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1977, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1925, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1944, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 17 sites
- Subject retention call completed for 21 overdue visits
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 84%

### Notes
- Week 19: Pain management assessments on track. 109 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
